00048 class U_EXPORT UClientImage_Base : public UEventFd {
00049 public:
00050 
00051         // NB: these are public for plugin access...
00052 
00053         UString* logbuf;
00054         UIPAddress* clientAddress;
00055 
00056         static UString* body;
00057         static USocket* socket;
00058         static UString* rbuffer;
00059         static UString* wbuffer;
00060         static bool bIPv6, write_off;   // NB: we not send response because we can have used sendfile() etc...
00061         static UClientImage_Base* pClientImage;
00062 
00063         // NB: these are for ULib Servlet Page (USP) - U_DYNAMIC_PAGE_OUTPUT...
00064 
00065         static UString* _value;
00066         static UString* _buffer;
00067         static UString* _encoded;
00068 
00069         // SERVICES
00070 
00071         static void clear();
00072         static void run();
00073         static void resetBuffer();
00074         static void genericReset();
00075         static void init(USocket* p);
00076 
00077         // check if data read already available... (pipelining)
00078 
00079         static bool isPipeline(uint32_t size)
00080                 {
00081                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage_Base::isPipeline(%u)", size)
00082 
00083                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("size_message = %u pcount = %d pbuffer = %p", USocketExt::size_message, USocketExt::pcount, USocketExt::pbuffer)
00084 
00085                 if ((int32_t)USocketExt::size_message  > 0 && size      &&
00086                          (USocketExt::pcount                                       > 0 || size > USocketExt::size_message))
00087                         {
00088                         U_RETURN(true);
00089                         }
00090 
00091                 U_RETURN(false);
00092                 }
00093 
00094         // log
00095 
00096         static void logRequest( const char* filereq = FILETEST_REQ);
00097         static void logResponse(const char* fileres = FILETEST_RES);
00098 
00099         static void logCertificate(void* x509); // aggiungo nel log il certificato Peer del client ("issuer","serial")
00100 
00101         // get remote ip address
00102 
00103         static UIPAddress& remoteIPAddress()
00104                 {
00105                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage_Base::remoteIPAddress()")
00106 
00107                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(socket)
00108                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pClientImage)
00109 
00110                 if (pClientImage->logbuf) return *pClientImage->clientAddress;
00111 
00112                 socket->setRemote();
00113 
00114                 return socket->remoteIPAddress();
00115                 }
00116 
00117         // check for X-Forwarded-For: client1, proxy1, proxy2
00118 
00119         static const char* getRemoteInfo(uint32_t* plen);
00120 
00121         // welcome message
00122 
00123         static void setMsgWelcome(const UString& msg);
00124 
00125         // define method VIRTUAL to redefine
00126 
00127         virtual void reset()
00128                 {
00129                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage_Base::reset()")
00130 
00131                 reuse(); // NB: we need this because we reuse the same object USocket...
00132 
00133                 genericReset();
00134                 }
00135 
00136         // define method VIRTUAL of class UEventFd
00137 
00138         virtual int handlerRead();
00139         virtual int handlerWrite();
00140 
00141 #ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00142         UEvent<UClientImage_Base>* pevent;
00143 
00144         void delEvent();
00145         void operator()(int fd, short event);
00146 #endif

00154 protected:
00155         static UString* msg_welcome;
00156 
00157         // NB: we need this because we reuse the same object USocket...
00158 
00159         void reuse()
00160                 {
00161                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage_Base::reuse()")
00162 
00163                 pClientImage = this;
00164 
00165                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("pClientImage = %p fd = %d socket->iSockDesc = %d", pClientImage, UEventFd::fd, socket->iSockDesc)
00166                 }
00167 
00168         void resetSocket(USocket::State state)
00169                 {
00170                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage_Base::resetSocket(%d)", state)
00171 
00172                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("pClientImage = %p fd = %d socket->iSockDesc = %d", pClientImage, UEventFd::fd, socket->iSockDesc)
00173 
00174                 socket->iState          = state;
00175                 socket->iSockDesc = UEventFd::fd;
00176                 }
00177 
00178         // COSTRUTTORI
00179 
00180                                 UClientImage_Base();
00181         virtual ~UClientImage_Base()
00182                 {
00183                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClientImage_Base)
00184 
00185                 reuse(); // NB: we need this because we reuse the same object USocket...
00186 
00187                 destroy();
00188                 }
00189 
00190         static void destroy();
00191 
00192         // check if data read already available... (pipelining)
00193 
00194         static bool isPipeline();
00195 
00196         static void checkForPipeline()
00197                 {
00198                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage_Base::checkForPipeline()")
00199 
00200                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(rbuffer)
00201 
00202                 uint32_t size = rbuffer->size();
00203 
00204                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("rbuffer->size() = %u size_message = %u pcount = %d pbuffer = %p",
00205                                                           size, USocketExt::size_message, USocketExt::pcount, USocketExt::pbuffer)
00206 
00207                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MAJOR((int32_t)USocketExt::size_message,0)
00208 
00209                 if (size > USocketExt::size_message)
00210                         {
00211                         USocketExt::pcount  = size - USocketExt::size_message;
00212 #               ifdef DEBUG
00213                         USocketExt::pbuffer = rbuffer->data();
00214 #               endif
00215 
00216                         U_INTERNAL_DUMP("pcount = %d pbuffer = %p", USocketExt::pcount, USocketExt::pbuffer)
00217                         }
00218                 }
00219 
00220 private:
00221         UClientImage_Base(const UClientImage_Base&) : UEventFd()        {}
00222         UClientImage_Base& operator=(const UClientImage_Base&)   { return *this; }
00223 
00224         friend class UHTTP;
00225         friend class UServer_Base;
00226 };

00228 template <class Socket> class U_EXPORT UClientImage : public UClientImage_Base {
00229 public:
00230 
00231         // COSTRUTTORI
00232 
00233         UClientImage() : UClientImage_Base()
00234                 {
00235                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClientImage, "", 0)
00236                 }
00237 
00238         virtual ~UClientImage()
00239                 {
00240                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClientImage)
00241                 }
00242 
00243         static Socket* getSocket() { return (Socket*) socket; }
00244 
00245         // DEBUG
00246 
00247 #ifdef DEBUG
00248         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UClientImage_Base::dump(reset); }
00249 #endif
00250 
00251 private:
00252         UClientImage(const UClientImage&) : UClientImage_Base() {}
00253         UClientImage& operator=(const UClientImage&)            { return *this; }
00254 };

00256 #ifdef HAVE_SSL // specializzazione con USSLSocket
00257 
00258 template <> class U_EXPORT UClientImage<USSLSocket> : public UClientImage_Base {
00259 public:
00260 
00261         SSL* ssl;
00262 
00263         UClientImage() : UClientImage_Base()
00264                 {
00265                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClientImage<USSLSocket>, "", 0)
00266 
00267                 // NB: we need this because we reuse the same object USocket...
00268 
00269                 ssl = getSocket()->ssl;
00270 
00271                 if (logbuf) logCertificate();
00272                 }
00273 
00274         virtual ~UClientImage()
00275                 {
00276                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClientImage<USSLSocket>)
00277 
00278                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(socket)
00279                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(socket->isSSL(), true)
00280 
00281                 if (socket->isOpen())
00282                         {
00283                         U_INTERNAL_DUMP("ssl = %p ssl_fd = %d fd = %d sock_fd = %d", ssl, SSL_get_fd(ssl), UEventFd::fd, socket->getFd())
00284 
00285                         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(SSL_get_fd(ssl), UEventFd::fd)
00286 
00287                         // NB: we need this because we reuse the same object USocket...
00288 
00289                         getSocket()->ssl = ssl;
00290                         }
00291                 }
00292 
00293         // SERVICES
00294 
00295         static USSLSocket* getSocket() { return (USSLSocket*)socket; }
00296 
00297         // aggiungo nel log il certificato Peer del client ("issuer","serial")
00298 
00299         void logCertificate()
00300                 {
00301                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage<USSLSocket>::logCertificate()")
00302 
00303                 // NB: OpenSSL already tested the cert validity during SSL handshake and returns a X509 ptr just if the certificate is valid...
00304 
00305                 UClientImage_Base::logCertificate(getSocket()->getPeerCertificate());
00306                 }
00307 
00308         // define method VIRTUAL of class UClientImage_Base
00309 
00310         virtual void reset()
00311                 {
00312                 U_TRACE(0, "UClientImage<USSLSocket>::reset()")
00313 
00314                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("ssl = %p ssl_fd = %d fd = %d", ssl, SSL_get_fd(ssl), UEventFd::fd)
00315 
00316                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(UEventFd::fd == SSL_get_fd(ssl))
00317 
00318                 getSocket()->ssl = ssl; // NB: we need this because we reuse the same object USocket...
00319 
00320                 UClientImage_Base::reset();
00321                 }
00322 
00323         // DEBUG
00324 
00325 #ifdef DEBUG
00326         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00327 #endif
00328 
00329 private:
00330         UClientImage<USSLSocket>(const UClientImage<USSLSocket>&) : UClientImage_Base() {}
00331         UClientImage<USSLSocket>& operator=(const UClientImage<USSLSocket>&)                              { return *this; }
00332 };

00334 #endif
